title: What are 5 must-have gadgets for everyday use? - Quora

response.answer_text: Almost everyone has access to modern gadgets in these modern times. Many of these gadgets are being used by people to listen to music or to be entertained, to communicate, to take pictures, to play games, to exercise, to write notes, and in other activities.There are many gadgets which is useful in our everyday life but i have listed few gadgets which i am using from long time. Smart Door Lock Google Chromecast Smart LED bulbs Portable Charger Solar-powered light
